body:
Hi Greg,


Thanks for the update. I was worrying about rcontrib actually. I think I'll
just use upgrade and use rtcontrib until the rcontrib is deemed fully
tested. I should have thought of that sooner.  Sorry to spam the whole list
with this.


Tim
